segments.text: I'm watching this kitchen scene unfold before me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is diligently drying a plate by the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is completely overflowing the sink basin, cascading down the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn't seem to notice the growing puddle around her feet at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus is entirely on that single dish in her hands.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over to the left, a young boy is reaching into a “COOKIE JAR” in an open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's standing on a two-step stool that looks incredibly wobbly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His little sister is standing beside him, eagerly waiting for a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the stool's legs are splayed out, almost like it's about to tip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation feels like a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The serene garden outside the window offers such a strange contrast to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder when she will finally notice the flood around her.
segments.speaker: PAR
